content.raw:
Hello,
I am trying to record a log file for VRC qual_task_2. I am having problem replaying the log file /tmp/qual_task_2/state.log in gazebo with -p option, it gives me the error message "Unable to parse log file". However, if I run gazebo with the qual_task_2 arena without actually doing any control, replay works fine. As soon as I publish a message to 
"/atlas/joint_commands" the log file cannot be replayed? How are we supposed to control the robot?
content.html: Hello, I am trying to record a log file for VRC qual_task_2. I am having problem replaying the log file /tmp/qual_task_2/state.log in gazebo with -p option, it gives me the error message "Unable to parse log file". However, if I run gazebo with the qual_task_2 arena without actually doing any control, replay works fine. As soon as I publish a message to "/atlas/joint_commands" the log file cannot be replayed? How are we supposed to control the robot?
